description: Aims to find the most interruptible moments in Firefox.
author: Kamyar Ardekani
title: Woodpecker

preferences.name: clean_install
preferences.title: Whether or not all the preferences should be reset upon installation.

preferences.name: delivery.mode.observ_only
preferences.title: Whether or not only the observation should happen.

preferences.description: Determines what color scheme is used in doorhanger pop-ups
preferences.name: presentation.doorhanger.color_mode
preferences.title: Doorhanger color mode

preferences.name: timer.tick_length_s
preferences.title: Length of a tick in seconds

preferences.name: timer.silence_length_s
preferences.title: Length of the silence period in seconds

preferences.name: timer.random_interval_length_tick
preferences.title: Maximum length of the random time interval

preferences.name: timer.inactive_threshold_s
preferences.title: Minimum length of inactivity time to conclude user inactivity

preferences.name: timer.recently_active_threshold_s
preferences.title: Maximum length of activity time to conclude user has become active recently

preferences.name: experiment.default_delMode_weights
preferences.title: Weigths based on which the user is randomly put into an experimental mode

preferences.name: experiment.obs1_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the first observation period in the experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.intervention_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the intervention period in the experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.obs2_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the second observation period in the experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.fr_usage_logging.enabled
preferences.title: Whether the Woodpecker addon should log feature usage as well.

preferences.name: logger.recent_hist_count
preferences.title: Maximum number of log records to store when connection fails.

preferences.name: route.coefficient
preferences.title: Coefficient that scales the triggering behavior thresholds

name: woodpecker
